title: निज़ामुद्दीन में ‘मुस्लिम लड़कों द्वारा बर्तन चाट कर कोरोना वायरस फैलाने की कोशिश’ बता कर पुराना वीडियो शेयर
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: Bohras eat together in a big “thaal”. This one is from a jamatkhana where on several occasions there is food served. What’s happening here is taking not wasting food at an extreme level. 🤣🤣 https://t.co/irxJePHlZ3
